Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory416.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Supervisor', 3: 'What did just say?! That Ryan was a fake?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Yes, and we found Ryan out cold in a pipe at the medical department.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'And according to himself, he had been out of it for over half a day by the time we found him.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: 'Did he see the perpetrator?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The soldier shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: "Seems like we'll have to reassess the level of security here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: "What's our loss like?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "Well... about that, they didn't take anything.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'The only thing we lost is a coffee mug kept in the old warehouse.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Just like that, Lamia left.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 6: '1', 8: '1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}

{1: "She could have sunk Atlantis down to the depths of the ocean after Gray Raven and the red-haired woman left, but she didn't do that.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory399.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '2', 10: '1'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}

{1: "She could have crippled the teams that Babylonia had sent down with the Corrupted right when they arrived, but she didn't do that.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory401.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '2', 10: '1'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}

{1: "And she could have stopped them when they were overwriting the original biological permissions, but she didn't do that.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory415.jpg', 6: '1', 8: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}

{1: 'Atlantis has once existed, they have once existed, and the place that she deemed home has, too, once existed.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory398.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'She saw her long-cherished wish realized, but what was going to become of their fight?', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory398.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: "Do they wish to see the tombstone that's Atlantis rest forever in silence, or would they rather see it shine again in color?", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory398.jpg', 6: '1', 8: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}
{1: 'It takes Lamia no longer than a split second to know the answer.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'Which is why she chooses to stare quietly at this marine fortress as it makes its way out of the dead silence and regains life...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '...Much like a brain that kicks into gear again after a prolonged hibernation.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'This place is no longer the place to which she returns.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'She has finished what she was asked to do, making her a useful child.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'While those who had recognized her value are now part of the deadly deep sea.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'She clings to the now discolored coffee mug, redolent of a mermaid holding onto vanishing ocean foam.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'She swims toward the shoreâ€”toward the ultimate peace.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory396.jpg', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory391.jpg'}
